entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Redundant bound check for span.Length == 0 pattern #67270
    7.0.0
  • Invoke with 'null' arg doesn't work when the target arg is a Nullable byref #67269
  • Arm64: Revisit the heuristics for IO completion poller threads #67266
    7.0.0
  • ListBox.IndexFromPoint returns incorrect result in case of no match #67262
  • [API Proposal]: Add `Ping.SendPingAsync` overloads with `CancellationToken` #67260
  • build no longer works in directories donating dash on Windows #67259
  • ! has shocking behavior #67257
  • [arm64] JIT: Volatile.Write emits full memory barrier for floats #67254
    Future
  • JIT: Vector4 problems on arm64 #67252
    7.0.0
  • EqualityComparer<>.Default is not devirtualized for enums in R2R #67251
    7.0.0
  • Environment Variables not in IConfiguration #67249
  • Arm64: Consider using "DC ZVA" instruction #67244
  • [API Proposal]: [ReadOnly]Span<T>.CreateUnsafe(ref T, int) for compiler-tracked, arbitrary length spans #67242
  • DistributedCacheExtensions adds object caching methods #67237
  • WebAssembly Browser App project fails to run #67236
    7.0.0
  • Installing wasm-tools workload with .NET 7 Preview 2 fails to update the advertising manifests #67235
  • System.Text.Encoding.Tests.apk test failure #67234
    Future
  • JIT.HardwareIntrinsics tests failed with "almost" empty logs #67233
  • Reloc failures with NativeAOT on Apple Silicon #67232
  • Process.WaitForExit - COMException: The handle is invalid. #67231
  • The converter 'EnumConverter' is not compatible with the type 'System.Nullable`1[FooType]'. #67228
  • .NET 6 RAM consumption on Windows Server 2019 #67268
  • Count_Timeout_ThrowsAfterTooLongExecution test failure #67225
  • Server shutdown prevents large response from being sent to client during draining #67271
  • [Xml Serialization] Possible optimization when writing primitive objects #67222
  • [Xml serialization]ReflectionXmlSerializationWriter is using Array.GetValue method for primary type arrays #67221
  • Test failure XmlSerializerTests.XmlMembersMapping_With_ChoiceIdentifier #67218
  • Test failure BasicEventSourceTests.TestsManifestGeneration.Test_EventSource_EtwManifestGenerationRollover #67217
  • Test failure tracing/eventpipe/bigevent/bigevent/bigevent.sh #67216
  • Test failure JIT/opt/OSR/tailrecurse/tailrecurse.sh #67215
    7.0.0
  • Finally statement is not always been executed in Linux container #67214

Closed

  • [wasm][debugger] Assertion in `DebuggerTests.EvaluateOnCallFrameTests.EvaluateSimpleMethodCallsError` #65744
    7.0.0
  • AppHost requires macOS 10.15 while .net core 3.1 claims to support macOS 10.13+ #61173
    6.0.x
  • Proposal: use ValueTask<TItem> in CacheExtensions.GetOrCreateAsync #67069
  • [FileStream] Multiple FileShare are not working in FileStream #65953
  • `System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.Roslyn3.11.Tests` crashes due to an assertion on linux/arm64/debug #65817
    7.0.0
  • FileStream sets default encoding to UTF8-BOM in .net6 #67229
  • Resolving path to configuration files #67139
  • Message : No credentials are available in the security package (Rest Sharp C#) #66283
  • Question about Process redirected output and WaitForExit #65377
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Parameters can be passed in when getting services from IServiceProvider #67185
  • Handling of "invalid" HTTP header values results in values being incorrectly reordered #63833
    7.0.0
  • C++/CLI assembly is loaded into isolated AssemblyLoadContext (IsolatedComponentLoadContext) in .NET 6 #61105

PullRequests

Created

  • [debugger] First draft of managed debugger on wasi #67272
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono][workload] add workloads for win-arm64 using emulation again #67267
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] Add arm64 cross-arch msi installers #67265
    area-Setup
  • Obsolete key blob support on ECDiffieHellmanPublicKey #67264
    area-System.Security, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [PERF][MAUI] Update maui iOS build sed command #67263
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Increase timeout on regex count test #67256
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [wasm] Attempt to fix audit errors in sanitize #67255
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Remove `ToTimeoutSeconds`.`SendPingAsync` and fix `TimeSpan` behavior #67253
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • perf: wasm: Collect helix logs, and artifacts when the build fails #67248
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: refactor IsOSRLocal #67247
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] provisioning: run sanitize.py with python3 #67245
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Introduce abstract PartitionedRateLimiter #67241
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] improve SslStream tests on server 2022 #67240
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add CipherSuitesPolicy support for MsQuic #67239
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • JIT: Refactor call argument representation #67238
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixed dump path in HTTP stress test #67230
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Preserve parsed & raw header value ordering #67227
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Avoid issuing connection attempts for already cancelled requests #67226
    area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • [Draft] idea how to improve allocations when serializing primitive types #67223
    area-System.Xml, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Allow mismatched assembly name and file name #67220
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Account for global stores in hoisting properly #67213
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Perform type/layout verification on some mono-config elements to avoid silent failures or crashes later #65449
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [LibraryImportGenerator] Fix SpecialTypeInfo.Byte field #67261
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Add some documentation on `GT_CAST`'s semantics #67208
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Issue at most one connection attempt per request #67114
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Add struct info to JitDump for INDEX and IND nodes #67135
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Improved error handling in debug proxy #65828
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] Bump emscripten to 3.1.7 #67006
    area-Build-mono
  • [MAUI][PERF] Maui Perf add iOS Podcast SOD Tests #67165
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add arm64 cross-arch msi installers #67066
    area-Setup
  • Remove unnecessary remark from `ObservableCollection.CollectionChanged` #67250
    documentation, area-System.Collections
  • Obsolete ToXmlString and FromXmlString on ECC types #67246
    area-System.Security, breaking-change
  • [LibraryImportGenerator] Allow caller-allocated buffer for `CustomTypeMarshaller` to be `Span` of any unmanaged type for Value marshalling #67172
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: Use TimeSpan everywhere we use an int for seconds, milliseconds, and timeouts (Group 1/3) #64860
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm] MonoProxy.cs: Avoid some errors by pre-emptively checking #67243
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] EmccCompile: Improve AOT time by better utilizing the cores #67195
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [PERF] Added --logbuildoutput to microbenchmark runs. #67111
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix a few issues with merged wrappers uncovered by local testing #67211
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • add gregsdennis to area-system-text-json #67224
    community-contribution
  • Draft for x ^ 0 opt (#65071) #65072
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Port SequenceEqual to crossplat Vectors, optimize vector compare on x64 #67202
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Do not reorder HTTP header values #65249
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • CI matrix change: Windows #58989
    area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Perform reachability analysis before codegen #66967
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • WIP: switch over JIT/Methodical tests to run using merged wrappers #65597
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix loop cloning of array of struct with array field #67130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1686932 #67177
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Avoid pre-allocating large arrays in some scenarios for Enumerable.Chunk #67210
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Reflection Invoke refactoring to support future byref-like and IL emit features #66357
    area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Move to Windows.10.Amd64.Server2022.ES.Open #67054
    area-Infrastructure
  • Use the stapled OCSP response from TLS, when available. #67011
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Changing the logic for how we deal with RegexOptions.IgnoreCase matching. #67184
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Remove `IsEmpty` workaround in `Span` and `ReadOnlySpan` #66865
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Make the cross-component build just another invocation of the build-runtime script #67108
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Introduce write barriers in wasm bindings, migrate to ref/out params, add gc safe regions #65994
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Http` #66891
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • [RyuJIT] Emit shlx, sarx, shrx on x64 #67182
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add support for creating delegates to static virtual methods #66936
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix Missing Metadata for ThreadPool Event #67150
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 7.0.0
  • Add vectorized paths for Span<T>.Reverse #64412
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Add \<para> tags to remarks comments #67173
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Makes GetChildKeys more efficient #67186
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Update breaking-change-rules.md #66978
    documentation, area-Meta
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Do not call into MsQuic inside a lock #67037
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Use shared SocketAddress code in QUIC #66794
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Avoid allocating a delegate in OptionsMonitor.Get() when possible. #66688
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution
  • Design to support ByRefLike types in Generics #67129
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Add support for symbolicating traces via XHarness #66226
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Load R2R images on osx-arm64 according to Apple's guidelines #67118
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix missing side effect flags on HWI nodes #67206
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable QJFL and OSR by default for x64 and arm64 #65675
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Do not generate `TYP_STRUCT` `LCL_FLD` nodes #66251
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [IGNORE][wasm] debugging perf/wasm/aot #66973
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm
  • feat: Add support for emscripten module exports #66868
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, community-contribution
  • Multiple enveloped signatures #67010
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: DirectoryInfo.CopyTo / Directory.Copy #62375
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Improve `QuicImplementationProviders.MsQuic.IsSupported` for TLS1.3 On Windows #66019
    area-System.Net.Quic, community-contribution
  • Use a simpler representation for array addresses after morph #64581
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Port Access violation occurring in System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustRelationshipInformation fix from .netfx to .net-core #66726
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml (DRAFT) #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [wasm] improve I64 memory access #64845
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Add additional trace to HttpConnectionPool #66958
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • [mono] Remove mono-perfcounters.c and most of mono-counters.c #66986
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Rely on PGO for isinst/castclass #65922
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Double Vector128 for SpanHelpers.IndexOf(byte,byte,int) on ARM64 #66993
    area-System.Memory
  • JIT: Optimize range checks for X >> CNS and for short/byte indices #67141
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove ternary workaround for string.IsNullOrEmpty #63095
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • NativeAOT: Guarded devirtualization #64497
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • System.Runtime no longer needs to enable preview features #67162
    area-System.Runtime, 7.0.0
  • Enable System.Text.Json tests on netfx (#63803) #67007
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Add dynamic shim for SSL_CTX_set_options and SSL_set_options #67145
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security
  • [Mono] Fix warnings to enable W4 on Windows. #66710
    os-windows, area-Build-mono
  • Improve exception thrown when constructing SslCertificateTrust #66763
  • JIT: Optimize unused array allocations #67205
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix read of image_info while raising image_unload event #67138
    area-System.Diagnostics-mono, community-contribution
  • DebuggerDisplay Stopwatch #65753
    area-System.Diagnostics, community-contribution
  • Enable string properties evaluation of Length and Char[]. #67028
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix r4 r8 numbers #66979
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Refactor suggested in 65842 #66821
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Debuger tests refactor 63667 #63730
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Publish crossgen as AOT if supported by the target platform #65948
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
